propertyMode

value_and_history

This is not necessarily an API question

Can we get a bit more info on how the free trial enrollment is working

That part is kind of proprietary to whatever you are doing a free trial of, since it is your company's product you are trialing, I assume

So we have to have a lot more context to respond effectively

Right now when someone fills out the form for the free trail the persons info goes to an employee the employee then has to redirect them to the free trail page manually and sign them up manually. I am wanting to automate it so when a person fills out the form it automatically takes them to the free trail page instead of having an employee manually send them a link to the free trail page
This sounds like it just needs a simple redirect on the form submission?
depending on the what system they have the free trial on, a webhook to send that data out to an external script that then interfaces with their free trial software might do the trick
Agreed, a webhook could work, or it could be something CMS'y with the gating / design of the free trial form, or it could be something you can do with JavaScript on your signup page
There are a ton of ways you could do it but a lot of it depends on your exact systems and ways of doing business and not on HubSpot's API specifically
We went ahead and cloned the table and republished the new one, same message (different table number)
I verified the api is working correctly by searching another portal / published table
`<https://api.hubapi.com/hubdb/api/v2/tables/2895189/rows?portalId=5681684>` and I get a response back no problem
Is it public?
The table?
yes it is <@U38EZFVFE>
<@U2LEJ045D> I have to run out to run, literally. I’ll be back in a bit. hopefully this can get the eyes of someone from HS here
thanks a million <@U25PYL3Q8>
<@U2LEJ045D>  just an FYI the HubSpot search doesn't search hub DB directly. It only searches dynamic pages created by hubdb
oh really?
Yes
so you can't search the actual table...
got it thanks <@U38EZFVFE>
Thank you very much <@U012W4YEUTX>

Hello HubSpot developers,
Is there a possibility to create Custom Reports by an App?
Or is there a way to do it via HubSpot API?
 
I am want to filter Timeline Object by Event Type and create a custom report. 
The link to this custom report to be linked either on Top Menu or in dashboard.
